metadata.synopsis: Character Creation dialog for Avatar Karlach
metadata.how_to_trigger: Select the character as an avatar in character creation and click the button that plays their voiced character description

0.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
0.text: Ten years ago, I was sold to the archdevil Zariel - she put a hellfire engine in my chest and made me her prize soldier.

2.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
2.text: But I've escaped now - thank you, mind flayers - and I've got a few scores to settle, if this engine doesn't burn me to ash first.

3.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
3.text: I'll need people I can trust. An infernal mechanic. And a serious amount of luck. But you know what? I'm not worried.

1.speaker: Origin_Intro_Karlach
1.text: After ten years in the hells, I can take on anything. I've got my chance at freedom, and believe me - I'm going home.
